app.name: SaveYourTime
app.tagline: Ƙarin sarrafa lokaci wanda ke taimaka maka wajen amfani da lokacin dijital ɗinka cikin inganci

popup.otherSites: Sauran Gidajen Yanar Gizo da aka Iyakance

warn.title: Lokacinka Ya Ƙare!
warn.message: Ka cika iyakar lokacin rana don wannan gidan yanar gizo. Wannan babbar dama ce don maimaita hankalinka ga ayyuka masu muhimmanci!
warn.dailyStats: Yau wannan gidan yanar gizo da amfani na gaba ɗaya na {{ totalTime }}

stats.restrictedSites: Gidajen Yanar Gizo da aka Iyakance
stats.blocked: Gidajen Yanar Gizo da aka Toshe
stats.notBlocked: Gidajen Yanar Gizo da aka Yarda
stats.mostVisited: Gidajen Yanar Gizo da Kake Ɗaukar Lokaci Mai Yawa

sites.restrictedSites: Gidajen Yanar Gizo da aka Iyakance

activeLimits.title: Gidajen Yanar Gizo da aka Iyakance a Halin Yanzu

general.title: Saituna na Gaba Ɗaya
general.resetDataConfirm: Za a share duk bayanan da aka ajiye. Ba za a iya juya wannan aiki ba. Kana son ci gaba?

timeLimit.title: Iyakance Lokaci
timeLimit.description: Saita iyakar lokacin rana don kafofin sadarwa da sauran gidajen yanar gizo masu ɓata hankali. Za a yi maka tunatarwa a hankali lokacin da ka kai ga iyakarka.

statistics.title: Ba da Bayanai kan Amfani
statistics.description: Bi yawan lokacin da kake kashewa a gidajen yanar gizo daban-daban tare da zane mai gani kuma sarrafa lokacinka da kyau.

blocking.title: Toshe na Dabara
blocking.description: Zaɓi tsakanin toshe cikakke ko tunatarwa da sauri lokacin da aka zarce iyakokin lokaci. Za ka iya ƙara ƙarin lokaci duk lokacin da kake bukata.

steps.title: Ƙara Gidajen Yanar Gizo
steps.description: Ƙara gidajen yanar gizo da kake son iyakance lokaci a kansu kuma saita iyakar lokacin rana ga kowanne.

steps.title: Bi Amfani
steps.description: Ƙarin yana aiki a sirri a baya, yana lura da lokacin da kake kashewa a gidajen yanar gizo da aka keɓance.

steps.title: Sanarwar Iyaka
steps.description: Lokacin da lokacin da aka saita ya ƙare, za ka ga tunatarwa a hankali kafin ci gaba.

steps.title: Sarrafa Sauƙi
steps.description: Za ka iya ƙara lokaci ko cire duk iyakokin lokacin da ake bukata. Kana da iko a koyaushe.

privacy.title: Sirri da Tsaron Bayanai
privacy.description: SaveYourTime yana adana duk bayananku ne kawai a cikin mai kallo na ku kuma ba ya aika wata bayani zuwa waje. Ana adana bayanin amfani da gidan yanar gizo da saitunanku a amintacce a yankin "ajiyar gida" na mai kallonku.
privacy.details: Ƙarinmu yana buƙatar izini mai iyaka kawai kuma yana samun damar shiga kawai zuwa gidajen yanar gizo da kuka bayyana. Sirrinka da tsaron bayananku suna cikin abubuwan da muka fi ba da muhimmanci.
privacy.openSource: Duk lambar tushe tana buɗe kuma ana iya duba ta da gyara daga shafin GitHub namu.
privacy.learnMore: Don ƙarin bayani game da manufar sirrinka

privacy.title: Manufar Sirri na SaveYourTime
privacy.subtitle: Bayanai game da yadda muke kare sirrin bayananku

commitment.title: Alƙawarin Sirri
commitment.description: A SaveYourTime, muna ɗaukar sirri da tsaron bayananku tamkar abu mai muhimmanci. Wannan ƙarin [hl]ba ya aika wata bayani zuwa waje ba[/hl], kuma duk bayananku ana adana su ne kawai a cikin mai kallonku.

collected.title: Bayanan da Aka Tattaro
collected.intro: SaveYourTime yana tattara kuma yana adana waɗannan bayanai kawai:
collected.timeSpent: Lokacin da kuke kashewa a gidajen yanar gizo da kuka keɓance
collected.dailyLimits: Iyakokin lokacin rana da kuka saita
collected.storage: Ana adana waɗannan bayanan [hl]kawai a cikin mai kallonku na gida[/hl] kuma yana da muhimmanci don ƙarin ya yi aiki yadda ya kamata.

storage.title: Adana da Isar da Bayanai
storage.noSend: [hl]Ba ya aika wata bayanin mai amfani zuwa waje ba[/hl]
storage.localStorage: Yana adana duk bayanai a yankin ajiyar gida na mai kallonku
storage.offline: Yana iya aiki har ma lokacin da ba ku da haɗin intanet
storage.noTracking: Ba ya bi wata bayanan kama mai amfani ko bayanan zama

security.title: Tsaron Bayanai
security.intro: Tunda ana adana bayananku a cikin mai kallonku kawai:
security.browserClear: Ana iya share su idan kun share tarihin mai kallonku ko kasin
security.uninstall: Za ku iya share duk bayanan da aka rubuta daga mai kallonku lokacin da kuka cire ƙarin
security.access: Mai kallonku kawai zai iya samun damar ganin bayananku

permissions.title: Izini
permissions.intro: SaveYourTime yana buƙatar izinin mai kallo masu zuwa don aiki:
permissions.activeTab: Damar shiga tab mai aiki (don lura da lokacin da aka kashe a gidajen yanar gizo da kuka keɓance)
permissions.storage: Damar shiga ajiyar gida (don ajiye saitunanku da bayanan lokaci)
permissions.minimal: Waɗannan izini ne mafi ƙanƙanta da ake buƙata don ayyukan manyan ƙarin.

openSource.title: Lambar Tushe Mai Buɗewa
openSource.description: SaveYourTime shiri ne mai buɗe ido gaba ɗaya. Lambarmu tana samuwa ga duk wanda ya so duba ta a GitHub.
openSource.transparency: Wannan buɗewa tana nuna alƙawarinmu na sirri. Duk wanda ya so duba lambar zai iya tabbatar da cewa ƙarin ba ya aika wata bayani ba gaske.

rights.title: Hakkin Mai Amfani
rights.intro: A matsayin mai amfani da SaveYourTime, za ku iya:
rights.remove: Cire ƙarin daga saitunan mai kallonku a duk lokaci
rights.delete: Share duk bayanan da aka rubuta daga saitunan ƙarin
rights.modify: Gyara duk wata bayani da kuke so daga saitunan ƙarin

questions.title: Tambayoyi
questions.contact: Idan kuna da wata tambaya game da manufar sirinmu, don Allah a tuntubi mu ta hanyar shirin GitHub ɗinmu.
